DataElement.preferredName: Tissue Donor Prior Five Year Non Medical Drug Injection Use Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication of whether the donor has a history of drug injection(s) (intravenous and/or intramuscular and/or subcutaneous) for non-medical use in the last 5 years as provided by the primary history source.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Tissue Donor Prior Five Year Non Medical Drug Injection Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person._Earlier in time or order._A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction._Relating to the study or practice of medicine._A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product._Administration of a drug into a location within the body; this can be achieved either through an established access or via a needle._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Concepts.definition: Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

Property.preferredName: Prior Five Year Negation Medical Medication Injection Procedure Use
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Relating to the study or practice of medicine.:A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.:Use of a syringe and needle to push fluids or drugs into the body; often called a "shot.":A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

Concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Relating to the study or practice of medicine.

A drug product that contains one or more active and/or inactive ingredients; it is intended to treat, prevent or alleviate the symptoms of disease. This term does not refer to the individual ingredients that make up the product.
Administration of a drug into a location within the body; this can be achieved either through an established access or via a needle.
A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Drug injection(s) (intravenou
ReferenceDocuments.description: Drug injection(s) (intravenous, intramuscular, and subcutaneous) for non-medical use in the last 5 years
